game.name: Deadly Dungeon
game.genres: 액션, 인디, RPG, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Descend into the Deadly Dungeon in order to find freedom that was taken away from you. Deadly Dungeon is dungeon crawler with class system and turn-based combat, featuring many horror elements with retro graphics. Fight, loot, explore, but keep moving, as the next stop you make, could be your last.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Descend into the Deadly Dungeon in order to find freedom that was taken away from you. Fight, loot, explore, but keep moving, as the next stop you make, could be your last.
